sql-statements.statement: App::Statements::Component::Org
Select org_id,primary_name,org_internal_id FROM org ,ORG_CATEGORY oc WHERE owner_org_id= ? AND oc.parent_id = org.org_internal_id AND oc.member_name='Lab' order by org_id

SELECT code, modifier, (SELECT caption FROM Catalog_Entry_Type WHERE id = oce.entry_type) as type, name, (expected_cost) as exp_cost, (allowed_cost) as all_cost, oce.entry_id, con.internal_contract_id, ocp.price_id, decode(ocp.price_id,NULL,'Add','Mod') FROM Contract_Catalog con, Offering_catalog_Entry oce, Offering_CatEntry_Price ocp WHERE con.internal_contract_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = con.parent_catalog_id AND con.org_internal_id = ? AND ocp.internal_contract_id (+)= ? AND ocp.entry_id (+) = oce.entry_id order by modifier, code

SELECT con.contract_id, con.caption, (SELECT catalog_id from offering_catalog oc WHERE oc.internal_catalog_id = con.parent_catalog_id) as catalog_id, (SELECT product_name FROM Insurance WHERE ins_internal_id = con.product_ins_id) as product_name, (SELECT count (*) FROM offering_catalog_entry where catalog_id = con.parent_catalog_id) as code_entry, (SELECT 0 from dual) as price_entry, internal_contract_id FROM Contract_Catalog con WHERE org_internal_id = ?

SELECT oce.code AS code, oce.modifier AS modifier, catalog_entry_type.caption AS Type, oce.name, --description AS description, DECODE(oce.flags, 0, NULL, '(FFS)'), oce.unit_cost AS price, --default_units AS uoh, 'Add', oce.parent_entry_id, oce.entry_id AS ID, oc.internal_catalog_id FROM catalog_entry_type, offering_catalog_entry oce, offering_catalog oc WHERE oce.catalog_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oce.entry_type = catalog_entry_type.id ORDER BY oce.entry_type, oce.code, oce.modifier

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT oc.catalog_id, oc.caption, --oc.description, DECODE(oc_a.value_int, 1, '(Capitated)', '(FFS)') AS capitated , count(oce.entry_id) entries_count, oc.parent_catalog_id, oc.internal_catalog_id, 'Add' FROM ofcatalog_Attribute oc_a, offering_catalog oc, offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oce.catalog_id (+) = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc_a.parent_id (+) = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 0 AND (oc.org_internal_id IS NULL OR oc.org_internal_id = ?) AND EXISTS ( SELECT unique ia.value_text FROM insurance i, org o, insurance_attribute ia WHERE ia.value_text = oc.internal_catalog_id AND ia.parent_id = i.ins_internal_id AND ia.item_name = 'Fee Schedule' AND i.owner_org_id = ? AND i.ins_org_id = o.org_internal_id AND o.org_id = ? ) GROUP BY oc.catalog_id, oc.internal_catalog_id, oc.caption, oc.description, oc.parent_catalog_id , oc_a.value_int ORDER BY oc.catalog_id ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT oc.catalog_id, oc.caption, --oc.description, DECODE(oc_a.value_int, 1, '(Capitated)', '(FFS)') AS capitated , count(oce.entry_id) entries_count, oc.parent_catalog_id, oc.internal_catalog_id, 'Add' FROM ofcatalog_Attribute oc_a, offering_catalog oc, offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oce.catalog_id (+) = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc_a.parent_id (+) = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oc.catalog_type = 0 AND (oc.org_internal_id IS NULL OR oc.org_internal_id = ?) GROUP BY oc.catalog_id, oc.internal_catalog_id, oc.caption, oc.description, oc.parent_catalog_id , oc_a.value_int ORDER BY oc.catalog_id ) WHERE rownum <= 250

SELECT oce.code, --oce.name, oce.modifier, --oce.description, oce.name, --oce.modifier, oce.data_text, oce.entry_id, oce.catalog_id, oce.entry_type, oce.unit_cost, oce.data_num FROM offering_catalog oc,org o, offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE o.owner_org_id = ? AND o.org_id = ? AND o.org_internal_id = oc.org_internal_id AND oc.internal_catalog_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id=oc.internal_catalog_id AND parent_entry_id is null order by oce.modifier,oce.code,oce.name

SELECT oc.catalog_id,oc.caption , count (oce.catalog_id),oc.internal_catalog_id FROM offering_catalog oc, org, offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oc.catalog_type = 5 AND oc.org_internal_id = org.org_internal_id AND org.org_id = ? AND org.owner_org_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id (+)= oc.internal_catalog_id AND oce.parent_entry_id IS NULL group by oc.catalog_id,oc.caption ,oc.internal_catalog_id order by oc.catalog_id

SELECT trans_id, trans_type, t.caption, detail, trans_subtype FROM transaction t, alert_priority a WHERE trans_owner_type = 1 AND trans_owner_id = ( SELECT org_internal_id FROM org WHERE owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) AND trans_type between 8000 and 8999 AND trans_status = 2 AND a.caption = t.trans_subtype ORDER BY a.id desc, trans_begin_stamp desc
select item_id, value_type, item_name, value_text from org_attribute where parent_id = (select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) and value_type = 252

select category, count(category), org_internal_id from person_org_category where org_internal_id = (select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) group by category, org_internal_id

SELECT item_id, value_int AS day, value_text AS name_begin, value_textb AS name_end, value_intb AS balance_condition, value_float AS balance_criteria FROM org_attribute WHERE parent_id = (SELECT org_internal_id FROM org WHERE owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ?) AND value_type = 650 ORDER BY day

(select oa.value_type, oa.item_id, oa.value_text, decode(to_char(oa.value_date, 'YYYY'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY'), to_char(oa.value_date, 'Mon DD'), to_char(oa.value_date, 'MM/DD/YY')), decode(oa.value_int, 0,'Per-Se',2,'THINet', 'Other'), decode(oa.value_intb, '1','Active', 'Inactive'), o.org_id, 2 as entity_type from org o, org_attribute oa where o.owner_org_id = ? and o.org_id = ? and oa.parent_id = o.org_internal_id and oa.item_name = 'Organization Default Clearing House ID' and oa.value_type = 960) UNION (select pa.value_type, pa.item_id, pa.value_text, decode(to_char(pa.value_date, 'YYYY'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY'), to_char(pa.value_date, 'Mon DD'), to_char(pa.value_date, 'MM/DD/YY')), decode(pa.value_int, 0,'Per-Se', 2,'THINet', 'Other'), decode(pa.value_intb,'1','Active', 'Inactive'), pa.parent_id, 0 as entity_type from Person_Attribute pa, Person_Org_Category poc where poc.org_internal_id = ? and poc.category = 'Physician' and pa.parent_id = poc.person_id and pa.value_type = 960) UNION (select -1 as value_type, -1 as item_id, '-' as value_text, '-' as value_date, '-', '-', '-', 1 as entity_type from dual ) order by entity_type DESC

select oce.entry_id, oce.catalog_id, oce.code, oce.unit_cost from offering_catalog_entry oce, offering_catalog oc where oc.catalog_id = oce.catalog_id and oc.org_internal_id = (select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) order by oce.entry_type, oce.status, oce.name, oce.code

SELECT o.org_id, a.value_date, DECODE (o.org_id, ?, 'Parent Org', 'Child Org') as parent_child, oc.member_name FROM org o, org_attribute a, org_category oc WHERE a.parent_id = o.org_internal_id AND a.item_name = 'Retire Batch Date' AND EXISTS ( SELECT o1.org_id FROM org o1 WHERE o1.org_id = ? AND ( o1.org_internal_id = o.parent_org_id OR o1.org_internal_id = o.owner_org_id OR o1.org_internal_id = o.org_internal_id ) ) AND o.org_internal_id = oc.parent_id AND UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(oc.member_name))) IN ('CLINIC','HOSPITAL','FACILITY/SITE','PRACTICE','DIAGNOSTIC SERVICES', 'DEPARTMENT', 'THERAPEUTIC SERVICES') ORDER BY parent_child DESC, o.org_id

SELECT value_int, value_type, item_name, value_text, item_id, 'attr-Org-' AS dialogid_suffix FROM Org_Attribute WHERE parent_id = ? AND value_type IN ( 10, 15, 20, 40, 50, 25 ) ORDER BY value_type, name_sort, item_name

SELECT value_int AS preferred, value_type, value_text || ' (' || DECODE(value_type, 25, value_textb, item_name) || ')', item_id, avt.caption AS caption, 'attr-Org-' || value_type AS dialogid_suffix FROM Org_attribute, attribute_value_type avt WHERE parent_id = ( SELECT org_internal_id FROM org WHERE owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) AND value_type IN ( 10, 15, 20, 40, 50, 25 ) AND avt.id = value_type AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM Org_Contact_Name ocn WHERE (ocn.caption = item_name AND value_type <> 25) OR (ocn.caption = value_textb and value_type = 25) ) UNION ALL ( SELECT 0 AS preferred, 99998 AS value_type, '-' AS value_text, -1, '-', '-' FROM dual ) UNION ALL ( SELECT 0 AS preferred, 99910 AS value_type, complete_addr_html AS value_text, item_id, address_name AS caption, DECODE('Org', 'Person', 'attr-person-', 'Org', 'attr-org-' ) || 99910 AS dialogid_suffix FROM Org_address, Org_Contact_Addrs oca WHERE parent_id = ( SELECT org_internal_id FROM org WHERE owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) AND oca.caption = Org_address.address_name ) ORDER BY value_type
select value_type, item_id, item_name, value_text from org_attribute where parent_id = (select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) and value_type = 600

select ocat.parent_id, org.name_primary, org.parent_org_id, org.org_id, org.org_internal_id from org org, org_category ocat where org.parent_org_id = (select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) and ocat.member_name = 'Department' and ocat.parent_id = org.org_internal_id

select oc.catalog_id, oc.caption, count(oce.entry_id) from offering_catalog oc, offering_catalog_entry oce where oc.catalog_id = oce.catalog_id (+) and oc.org_internal_id = (select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) group by oc.catalog_id, oc.caption, oc.description, oc.parent_catalog_id order by oc.caption

SELECT oc.catalog_id, oc.caption, oc.description, oc.internal_catalog_id, oa.item_id FROM org_attribute oa, offering_catalog oc WHERE oa.parent_id = ? AND oa.item_name = 'Fee Schedule' AND oa.item_type = 0 AND oa.value_type = 110 AND oa.value_int = oc.internal_catalog_id ORDER BY oc.catalog_id

SELECT oce.code,oce.name,(SELECT caption FROM catalog_entry_type WHERE id = oce.entry_type), oce.entry_id, oce.unit_cost FROM offering_catalog_entry oce,offering_catalog oc WHERE oce.catalog_id = ? AND oc.internal_catalog_id = oce.catalog_id ORDER BY 1
select name_primary, name_trade, category, tax_id, org_id, org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? )

select rule_id, start_age, end_age, diagnoses, measure, directions, src_begin_date, src_end_date from Hlth_Maint_Rule where org_internal_id = (select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? )

SELECT insurance.ins_internal_id, insurance.parent_ins_id, insurance.product_name, decode(insurance.record_type, 1, 'product', 2, 'plan', 3, 'coverage') as record_type, insurance.plan_name, insurance.ins_internal_id, insurance.owner_org_id, claim_type.caption, insurance.ins_type, insurance.indiv_deductible_amt, insurance.family_deductible_amt, insurance.percentage_pay, insurance.copay_amt, org.org_id FROM insurance, claim_type, org WHERE org.org_id = ? AND org.owner_org_id = ? AND insurance.record_type in (1, 2) AND insurance.ins_type = claim_type.id AND insurance.ins_org_id = org.org_internal_id ORDER BY insurance.product_name, insurance.plan_name

SELECT org_id, name_primary, org_internal_id, DECODE (o.org_internal_id, (SELECT oo.parent_org_id from org oo WHERE oo.org_id = ? AND owner_org_id = ?), 'Parent Org', 'Child Org') FROM Org o WHERE org_internal_id = ( SELECT parent_org_id FROM org WHERE owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) OR parent_org_id = ( SELECT org_internal_id FROM org WHERE owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) AND rownum <= 250 ORDER BY org_id

select 0 as preferred, 99910 as value_type, complete_addr_html,item_id,address_name,parent_id from org_address , org where org.org_id = ? AND org.owner_org_id = ? AND org_address.parent_id = org.org_internal_id AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Org_Contact_Addrs oac WHERE org_address.address_name = oac.caption) order by address_name

SELECT value_type, item_id, parent_id, item_name, value_text, value_textB, decode(to_char(value_date, 'YYYY'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY'), to_char(value_date, 'Mon DD'), to_char(value_date, 'MM/DD/YY')), decode(to_char(value_dateB, 'YYYY'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY'), to_char(value_dateB, 'Mon DD'), to_char(value_dateB, 'MM/DD/YY')) from Org_Attribute WHERE parent_id = ( SELECT org_internal_id FROM org WHERE owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) AND item_name = 'Org Notes'

select p.simple_name, pa.category, pa.person_id, pa.org_internal_id from person_org_category pa, person p where pa.org_internal_id = (select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ? ) and pa.category in ('Physician', 'Nurse', 'Staff', 'Administrator', 'Superuser') and p.person_id = pa.person_id order by pa.person_id, pa.category, p.complete_name

SELECT oc.catalog_id,oct.caption, count (oce.catalog_id) ,oc.internal_catalog_id FROM offering_catalog oc, offering_catalog_entry oce,org_attribute oa, offering_catalog_type oct WHERE oce.catalog_id (+)= oc.internal_catalog_id AND oa.parent_id = ? AND oa.item_name = 'Fee Schedule' AND oa.value_int = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oct.id = oc.catalog_type GROUP BY oc.catalog_id,oct.caption,oc.internal_catalog_id

SELECT oce.code,(SELECT name FROM ref_service_category WHERE oce.code = serv_category), oce.entry_id FROM offering_catalog_entry oce,offering_catalog oc WHERE oce.catalog_id = ? AND oc.internal_catalog_id = oce.catalog_id ORDER BY 1
select oc.internal_catalog_id, oc.catalog_id, oc.caption, oc.description from Offering_Catalog oc where oc.catalog_type = 4 and oc.org_internal_id = ? and oc.flags = 1
